item.title: Celebrating victory at CRIF Hackathon 2023
item.description: Winning a hackathon is an incredible feeling, and it’s even more special when it’s your very first one. The adrenaline rush of competing against some of the brightest minds in the industry, the satisfaction of solving complex problems, and the thrill of being recognized for your hard work are all emotions that are hard to put into words. In this article, I’ll walk you through the journey of our team who recently won their first ever hackathon, the CRIF Hackathon 2023.
